Name: City of Playford, Local and Family History Collection

About.Officer in charge: Grace Trimboli - Local and Family Historian

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon, Wed, Fri 9am-5pm, Thursday 1-5pm, Sat 9am-12noon; closed Tuesday and Sunday. On the 4th Thursday of each month there is a guest speaker night 6:30-8pm. Reference assistance and copying services available.

About.Acquisition focus: Current and retrospective materials in a variety of formats relating to the study of all aspects of the history of the City of Playford. Family History Research facilities available.

About.Major holdings: News Review/Messenger & Salisbury-Elizabeth Times Newspapers 1956- . Photographs 1956- . Oral histories of early residents. Family Search database. Range of Family History research microfiche.
